entry.title: LUNA SARAH K-STYLE 24H JUTE WHITE STRIPED BAG
entry.summary:
Vendor: FT-Retail
Type: BAG
Price: 180.00

K-Style 36H Jute Bag in beige by LUNA SARAH. This jute handbag with white striped print features two rolled-up carry handles at the top. Detachable shoulder strap. The fittings are silver.

Material: Recycled rough jute, white scarf.

Color: Natural beige with white striped print.

Dimensions: Approx. Width: 35cm; Height: 25cm, Depth: 11.5cm.

Handle drop: 9.0 cm.

Interior: Cotton lining, one zipped pocket, and two side pockets.

Handmade in Morocco.

 

 

THIS ITEM IS ON FINAL SALE AND CANNOT BE RETURNED OR EXCHANGED.
